creator: Identive
descriptionHtml:
Identive Games presents its new US city cargo truck simulator. Truck Simulator game helps to teach you how to drive the transport simulator truck on the roads and becomes the professional driver of the public transport simulator. In the cargo truck game you have to drive the dangerous delivery truck on the dangerous and mysterious roads of the truck parking simulator and deliver the cargo to the destination point.
This Heavy cargo truck game demands from you to transport the goods material and many other cargo items and deliver it from one place to another place. A trailer truck simulator helps you to become an expert in the driving of the euro truck. So hold your device and puts the thumb on the screen and press the play button to start the journey of the new life of the truck simulator game. Indian larry game is totally free and a brand new game for the public transport simulator. If you are a euro truck game lover then try our city cargo truck simulator.
Let's talk about the Gameplay of the real cargo truck driving first of all you need to select your favorite mode in the euro cargo truck simulator such as parking mode and career mode. In cargo simulator career mode have 10 levels Each level is thrilling and adventurous in the Indian truck game simulator. In new truck parking 2020 hard PVP car parking games clear all the levels to become the professional driver of the real city cargo truck game. In this hill city truck driving game you have to play like a pro trucker of Europe and clear the dangerous and tricky levels to become the king of the Euro truck. In this truck parking game show your skills in truck driving and win a double reward by participating in the truck race of the American truckers. Truck Simulator 3d has highly detailed trucks with amazing modifications. In city cargo parking you also have the option to customize your graphics as you want. In this transportation game beat your opponent trucker and win the battle of the annual truck master.
This trala game is the biggest revolution in the world of the truck game simulation. Indian trala and Indian larry game contain the localize traditional trucks with the amazing and traditional designs. Offroad mode of the city cargo is best in which you have to drive the monster cargo truck on the dangerous and bumpy roads of mountains and hills.
The real cargo city game is packed with 3d amazing graphics and has a unique and luxury Asian environment specially built for our beloved Asian players to give them the homeland touch. Heavy Cargo truck driving has smooth and multiple controls (Touch, Buttons, Tilt).

- Highly detailed Trucks.
- Amazing gameplay.
- Highly Optimized Graphics
